mapper.insert: insert into st.tna values(st.tna_seq.nextval, #{TnA_id}, sysdate, null, #{TnA_status_code})
mapper.update: update st.TnA set tna_end_time = sysdate, tna_status_code = #{TnA_status_code} where tna_seq = #{TnA_seq}
mapper.select: select tna_seq from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') like to_char(tna_start_time,'yyyymmdd'))
